pages.text: Spawn also in $(thing)The End$(), their primary purpose is to recharge the health of the $(thing)Ender Dragon$(). $(br2)If 4 are placed on the end exit portal, one on each of the flat sides, the crystals respawn the original $(item)End Crystals$() on the $(item)Obsidian$() pillars, as well as resurrect the $(thing)Dragon$() itself!
$(br)$(item)End Crystals$() explode when attacked or damaged in most ways and do a lot of damage.
